name: Rainy Day (ShaddyRuler)
description:
Escape from a flooded cave with the help of your trusty umbrella, and perhaps water some flowers on the way?

Controls: 

Mouse to aim umbrella.
WAS/Arrow Keys to move and open/close umbrella.

All content in the game was made by me. That said, there's no sound or music, and there's only one blank texture and an end screen art so. Not a lot for anyone else to take credit for anyway XD

But I would like to thank my gf for her support in making it and hopefully we can work together to improve it in the future <3
